segments.text: Karen , do you have a minute ? I'd like to ask you about something .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . What is it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think you can give me some advice.You have worked here longer , and I just want to know what you think .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm glad to help you . But what is it you want to ask about ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am worried about the meeting this morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why ? I think the meeting went well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . But what are you worried about ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid I was too rude .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Rude ? You weren't rude at all , Annie . Why do you think you were rude ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I maybe talked to Mr . Drummond too directly . I thought I maybe said too much . I don't want him to be angry .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I understand . But really you weren't rude at all.You said what you thought . I think he appreciates that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I am new here , and I'm not sure he is used to that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You mean because you are a woman ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . And he is the president of the company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Listen , Annie . You shouldn't worry about Mr . Drummond.He is a very good man to work for . He is not sexist at all.He appreciates people for their ideas.And he is willing to take suggestions from men or women .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am very happy to hear that , Karen.It ' s good to know I'm working in such a company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I agree with you on that , Annie . I've worked for Derek Drummond for nine years now . I feel he appreciates his employees for their work , not their gender . I would never change jobs .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good . Thank you for telling me this .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Any time . If you have a good idea , don't be afraid to speak up.This is a company that appreciates initiative .
segments.speaker: S2
